text:
**Subgraph OS** is a Debian-based Linux distribution which provides several security, anonymous web browsing and hardening features carefully integrated.
**Notable features**
- Uses a hardened Linux kernel, application firewall to block specific executables from accessing the network and forces all Internet traffic through the Tor network.
- A file manager which features tools to remove meta-data from files and integrates with the OnionShare file sharing application.
- Icedove e-mail client is set up to automatically work with Enigmail for encrypting e-mails.
- Stable base, updated to the latest possible packages for security purposes.
**Available DEs**
- GNOME
**More info**
https://subgraph.com/sgos/index.en.html
